alert.note: Alert for Coastal Jackson; Coastal Matagorda; Inland Jackson; Inland Matagorda; Wharton (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 10 at 2:22AM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Wharton, southeastern Jackson and west central Matagorda Counties through 300 AM CDT... At 221 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Palacios, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Palacios, Blessing and Midfield. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Jackson; Coastal Matagorda; Inland Jackson; Inland Matagorda; Wharton
